FuncDef: This command refers to the http host name of the landing server (Barefruit or Xerocole). It is used in the HTTP GET operation from the client (which is being redirected) to the redirect search landing server. It must contain a valid IP address or HTTP host name / URI for the HTTP GET from the client to the landing server to work.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a string of 255 chars max length, that refers to the HTTP host name of the landing server (barefruit or xerocole).
